author: Breezy Perkins
text:

author: Breezy Perkins
text:
Very true words. What will everyone do when Bill Gates owns all the food we eat and he dictates pricing... 

That is more scary than buying Twitter... https://t.co/OoO3DPVVbG

author: Breezy Perkins
text:
This is crazy!!!! Our news was already purchased by the top wealthy and they made their own narrative for the world to believe. 

And now that another ultra rich guy wants to do the same and its wrong? Democrats and Republicans are bought! Why is this such a shock? https://t.co/u5FuXRmBIl

text: Yep this is who you goted for Democrats https://t.co/RNKiI0uW6O

author: Breezy Perkins
text: Skip the 1st few min and watch the actual story..... might shock you....  https://t.co/HTBSgTtq5x

author: Breezy Perkins
text:
Why cant our government just admit when wrong, say sorry, tell us how you will fix it and move on like this guy just did? 

Why does the US government speakers make excuses, never answers the actual question and blames everyone one else for their short fallings? https://t.co/3wIcIwjncr

author: Breezy Perkins
text:
We need to invest in public schools. We need to audit the books, cut liget wasteful spending and give the poor districts the same tools the wealthy school districts have!

Everyone child should be entitled to same education regardless of where you live! https://t.co/dDrv8UGkWq

author: Breezy Perkins
text:
So true. Need to watch more than 1 new outlet, but most Americans are too lazy to do their own research so they depend on what they hear to be factual when its really just 1 sided.

There are always 3 sides to the truth. Need to spand how you obtain your knowledge. https://t.co/LVxabWpgLN

author: Breezy Perkins
text:
Raise your hand if your wondering why the news has not reported on Ghislaine Maxwell✋️

Where is her black book. If there was not a market for sex trafficking then we would not have this issue. We need to go after the rich and powerful that were involved.

author: Breezy Perkins
text: Told ya.... this was a plot.... this was staged... we saw video of the police holding the doors open to allow the crowd of people in. https://t.co/LMdi3BVreR

author: Breezy Perkins
text:
The lies the media told, which caused a wedge between families that believed the lie vs those that did not. 

Which government official will be held accountable for this misinformation? 

I bet no one, as the Government is never held accountable! https://t.co/QTC0OCycvW

author: Breezy Perkins
text: Great question.  If you want answers then ask the right questions. Think beyond basic questions. Ask the question that will allow us to see what's really going on behind the curtain. https://t.co/8yxZoirEgT
